metadata.name: PowerShell Get-Process LSASS
metadata.comment: Detects a "Get-Process" cmdlet and it's aliases on lsass process, which is in almost all cases a sign of malicious activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get-process lsas')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ps lsas')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gps lsas'))))

output.summary: Detects a "Get-Process" cmdlet and it's aliases on lsass process, which is in almost all cases a sign of malicious activity
